description: Take TV snacking to the next level with a bowl of these cheesy loaded fries. They’re easy to make and are ready to devour in 30 minutes.
keywords: Chips & fries,High fibre,High protein,Tree nut free,Spring,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Cheesy Loaded Fries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g middle bacon rashers, fat trimmed, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Divide fries between 2 large baking trays, then bake for 15 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, heat a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook bacon, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Reheat same pan over medium heat. Cook onion and garlic, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened.
Meanwhile, place gravy in a medium heatproof jug. Add 1 1/4 cups boiling water, whisking until smooth. Add sauce and gravy to onion mixture, then cook, stirring for 1 minute or until combined.
Drizzle gravy mixture over fries, scatter with cheese and bacon, then bake for 7 minutes or until cheese is golden and has melted. Serve sprinkled with parsley.
